channel.title: I’m Holding a Massive Rave at Earth’s Core - Lex [Hard Rave]
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/lextunes/lex-im-holding-a-massive-rave
New track I whipped up today. I really wanna make more tracks like this.
As always, feedback and gentle criticism is appreciated!

item.title: I’m Holding a Massive Rave at Earth’s Core - Lex [Hard Rave]
item.dc:creator: Lex
item.description:
Chaoticism and fast beats are kind of the point with my ravey music. It’s not for everyone, I understand that perfectly. Also I just can’t get mixing right, so I get ya. Anyway thanks for the feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: I’m Holding a Massive Rave at Earth’s Core - Lex [Hard Rave]
item.dc:creator: Peregrihn
item.description:
I think it accomplishes exactly what you were going for… not exactly my style but good for what it is. If it were mine I’d probably go back and tone down some of the volume in the parts that “aren’t exactly lead material” if you understand

item.source: I’m Holding a Massive Rave at Earth’s Core - Lex [Hard Rave]

item.title: I’m Holding a Massive Rave at Earth’s Core - Lex [Hard Rave]
item.dc:creator: Bassment_Chemists
item.description:
Honestly it sounds like you have two.different records spinning at the same time out of sync. It’s too busy for me to really get into. Plus the bmp is just too forceful, doesn’t give you a chance to follow along to a melody and the drums.are very chaotic, sorry I cant give more constructive criticism.

Read full topic
